properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ray ô, todihonao
Fa indro mitady Anao.
Izaho zanakao
Naniasia
Ny fahotako be
Manindry mafy re,
Ianao hamela anie,
Ray be fitia.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Avy manatona
Ity zanakao.
Aza akatona
Ny lanitrao

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tano akaikinao
Hijary tsara Anao,
Hanana ny endrikao
Mamiratra.
Raha sendra izay manjo
Ka ketraka ny fo,
Atrehonao tokoa
'Ndrao trotraka.
Avy manatona, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ray ô, marihonao
Ho isan'ny Anao
'Zay fifalianao
Mandrakizay !
Tsinjovy raha ety
Mandra-pahatonga ary
Anilanao, doria,
Rahatrizay !
Avy manatona, sns.
